name: SkyDancing - Edm Rhythm Games
description:
A quite new music game with +14 edm songs, catch the beat, feel the rhythm

This so-addictive-game is designed to be simple and easy for all to enjoy
Try to gather beats, catch the rhythm, you are playing with maximum great visual effects

***Features:
- One-finger-control: one-finger-reach-all control, easy for you to handle your phone while playing

- 4-direction navigation: collect beats and avoid obstacles.

- Electronica music: The game presents various best voted electronica music
For the best experience play with headphones and full volume

- 3D Space graphics: Fly and experience the 3D environment with random obstacles, simple design brings you all the good feeling

- Many maps with random curly path will bring you max feeling of traveling around the space

- Easy to play but hard to master

*** Future Features:

- Import your own music into the game and fly your way
